I am an Associate Professor in the <a href="http://www.miamioh.edu/cas/academics/departments/statistics/">Department of Statistics</a> at <a href="http://miamioh.edu/index.html">Miami University</a>. Originally from the city of <span class="dropt" title="">Baltimore<span><img src="images/bmore_night.jpg"/><br/></span></span>, I completed my graduate work at <a href="http://www.clemson.edu/">Clemson University</a> in <a href="https://www.clemson.edu/science/departments/math-stat/">Mathematical Sciences</a>. 


When not working on Statistics I like to

* play and coach hockey
* hike
* work on genealogy 
* spend time with my family
